titleStmt.title: A true copy of the whole printed acts of the General Assemblies of the Church of Scotland beginning at the assembly holden at Glasgow the 27 day of November 1638, and ending at the assembly holden at Edinburgh the 6 day of August 1649 / diligently compared and exactly reprinted, conformed to the foresaid printed acts by a welwisher of the Church of Scotland ...
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Includes table of contents on [13] p. at end.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library.
